channel.title: [PI] Weps for Pures
channel.description:
Well my bro wanted to create a pure on my server, but when he tries to weild rune scimmi, ddp, d scimi they ask for 40 def to wield, where do I change that?
and btw my G-maul's spec is not working
erasedpkz pure pking system is horrible lol, you need defence for d scim, ddp, rune arrows, etc lol, I'll try to fix it tho

item.title: [PI] Weps for Pures
item.dc:creator: @Soviet Soviet
item.description:
@Soviet wrote:

I know that is like that, but a code It’s ruining everything look:

if(itemName.contains("dragon")) { if (!itemName.contains("nti-") && !itemName.contains("fire")) { c.attackLevelReq = c.defenceLevelReq = 60; return;
The code above is telling me that any item with the term “dragon” its telling that you need 60 att & def, maybe change it to this?

if(itemName.contains("dragon")) { if (!itemName.contains("nti-") && !itemName.contains("fire")) { c.defenceLevelReq = 60; return;
Not working :S, any idea?

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Weps for Pures
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

[quote=“Soviet, post:2, topic:404848”] case 4587: // dscimmy case 19784: c.getPA().sendFrame171(0, 7599); specialAmount(weapon, c.specAmount, 7611); break;

To:

case 4587: // dscimmy c.attackLevelReq =60; c.defenceLevelReq =1; case 19784: c.getPA().sendFrame171(0, 7599); specialAmount(weapon, c.specAmount, 7611); break;

And for G Maul?

case 4153: // gmaul c.getPA().sendFrame171(0, 7474); specialAmount(weapon, c.specAmount, 7486); break;[/quote]
Was that made to be a joke?

Find

under it

case ITEM_ID: c.defenceLevelReq = #; c.attackLevelReq = #; c.strengthLevelReq = #;

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Weps for Pures
item.dc:creator: @Soviet Soviet
item.description:
@Soviet wrote:

case 4587: // dscimmy case 19784: c.getPA().sendFrame171(0, 7599); specialAmount(weapon, c.specAmount, 7611); break;

To:

case 4587: // dscimmy c.attackLevelReq =60; c.defenceLevelReq =1; case 19784: c.getPA().sendFrame171(0, 7599); specialAmount(weapon, c.specAmount, 7611); break;

And for G Maul?

case 4153: // gmaul c.getPA().sendFrame171(0, 7474); specialAmount(weapon, c.specAmount, 7486); break;

Read full topic
